attributes.action: Request the BBC to  repeat the classic  80's sitcom Dear John
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Showed only once in the mid 80's this  sitcom was a true John Sullivan classic.
Who can forget Kirk St Moritz or Louise the sex mad organiser of the 1-2-1 club.
Come on BBC this show deserves another turn.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
